onboarding.welcome:
Welcome to Profit Taker Analytics!
Let's go over some key features.
onboarding.navigation: Use your arrow keys, the buttons on the top right or your mouse scroll wheel to navigate between runs.
onboarding.screenshot: Click the copy button to automatically screenshot your run! No need for manual screenshots.
onboarding.main_nav: Use the navigation bar on the left to explore different sections of the app by clicking on the buttons.
onboarding.final: That's it! I hope you enjoy PTA.

errors.parser_connection_error:
The app cannot establish a connection to the parser.
Please restart the program.

If you continue with issues please contact Basi.
Contacts are available in the app settings.
errors.bugged_run_warning:
This run has been identified as potentially bugged. Some runs are not accurately recorded by Warframe,
making it impossible for us to retrieve all the data.

Unfortunately, this issue is beyond our control, but we will still show you all the information we can.
errors.existing_name: The name already exists. Please choose a different name.
errors.no_runs: No runs are available or recorded yet
errors.start_new_run: Please start a new run to begin!

donate.title: Donations
donate.main:
Your support keeps this project alive.
Hundreds of hours and immense effort have gone into this app.
Your donations help cover costs and motivate further development.

Thank you! <3
